mapper.select:
select Activity.WhenDate as when_date, Activity.WhoID as who_id, Activity.WhoType as who_type,
WhoUS.FirstName as who_user_firstname, WhoUS.LastName as who_user_lastname,
WhoUN.Name as who_uni_name,
OfWhoP.PhotoID as of_who_photo_id, OfWhoP.Title as of_who_photo_title, OfWhoP.Url as of_who_photo_url, OfWhoP.ThumbnailUrl as of_who_photo_t_url,
Activity.WhatID as what_id, Activity.WhatType as what_type,
WhatPH.Title as what_photo_title, WhatPH.Url as what_photo_url, WhatPH.ThumbnailUrl as what_photo_t_url,
WhatCO.Content as what_comment_content,
WhatST.FromYear as what_stage_from, WhatST.ToYear as what_stage_to, WhatSY.StudyID as what_study_id, WhatSY.Name as what_study_name, WhatUN.UniversityID as what_uni_id, WhatUN.Name as what_uni_name,
WhatUS.FirstName as what_user_firstname, WhatUS.LastName as what_user_lastname,
WhatGE.Name as what_group_name, WhatGE.Type as what_group_type,
OfWhatP.PhotoID as of_what_photo_id, OfWhatP.Title as of_what_photo_title, OfWhatP.Url as of_what_photo_url, OfWhatP.ThumbnailUrl as of_what_photo_t_url,
Activity.WhereID as where_id, Activity.WhereType as where_type,
WhereUS.FirstName as where_user_firstname, WhereUS.LastName as where_user_lastname,
WhereUN.Name as where_uni_name,
WhereGE.Name as where_group_name, WhereGE.Type as where_group_type,
WherePH.Title as where_photo_title, WherePH.Url as where_photo_url, WherePH.ThumbnailUrl as where_photo_t_url,
OfWhereP.PhotoID as of_where_photo_id, OfWhereP.Title as of_where_photo_title, OfWhereP.Url as of_where_photo_url, OfWhereP.ThumbnailUrl as of_where_photo_t_url
from activity Activity inner join ( select F.ReceiverID as MemberID from user_has_friend F where F.Status = 'CONFIRMED' and F.SenderID = #{elementId} union all
select F.SenderID as MemberID from user_has_friend F where F.Status = 'CONFIRMED' and F.ReceiverID = #{elementId} union all
select distinct ST.UniversityID as MemberID from stage ST where ST.UserID = #{elementId}
union all
select distinct ST.UserID as MemberID from stage ST where ST.UniversityID = #{elementId} union all select #{elementId} as MemberID ) Members on Activity.WhoID = Members.MemberID
left join active_element WhoAE on Activity.WhoID = WhoAE.ActiveElementID left join user WhoUS on WhoAE.ActiveElementID = WhoUS.UserID left join university WhoUN on WhoAE.ActiveElementID = WhoUN.UniversityID left join profile_photo OfWhoPP on WhoUS.UserID = OfWhoPP.UserID or WhoUN.UniversityID = OfWhoPP.UniversityID left join photo OfWhoP on OfWhoPP.PhotoID = OfWhoP.PhotoID
left join comment WhatCO on Activity.WhatID = WhatCO.CommentID and Activity.WhatType = 'COMMENT' left join photo WhatPH on Activity.WhatID = WhatPH.PhotoID and Activity.WhatType = 'PHOTO' left join group_event WhatGE on Activity.WhatID = WhatGE.GroupEventID and ( Activity.WhatType = 'GROUP_CREATION' or Activity.WhatType = 'EVENT_CREATION') left join stage WhatST on Activity.WhatID = WhatST.StageID and Activity.WhatType = 'STAGE_ADDED' left join study WhatSY on WhatST.StudyID = WhatSY.StudyID and WhatST.UniversityID = WhatSY.UniversityID left join university WhatUN on WhatST.UniversityID = WhatUN.UniversityID left join user WhatUS on Activity.WhatID = WhatUS.UserID and Activity.WhatType = 'FRIENDSHIP' left join profile_photo OfWhatPP on WhatUS.UserID = OfWhatPP.UserID or WhatUN.UniversityID = OfWhatPP.UniversityID or WhatGE.GroupEventID = OfWhatPP.GroupEventID left join photo OfWhatP on OfWhatPP.PhotoID = OfWhatP.PhotoID
left join active_element WhereAE on Activity.WhereID = WhereAE.ActiveElementID and (Activity.WhereType = 'USER' or Activity.WhereType = 'UNI') left join user WhereUS on WhereAE.ActiveElementID = WhereUS.UserID left join university WhereUN on WhereAE.ActiveElementID = WhereUN.UniversityID left join photo WherePH on Activity.WhereID = WherePH.PhotoID and Activity.WhereType = 'PHOTO' left join group_event WhereGE on Activity.WhereID = WhereGE.GroupEventID and Activity.WhereType = 'GROUP' left join profile_photo OfWherePP on WhereUS.UserID = OfWherePP.UserID or WhereUN.UniversityID = OfWherePP.UniversityID or WhereGE.GroupEventID = OfWherePP.GroupEventID left join photo OfWhereP on OfWherePP.PhotoID = OfWhereP.PhotoID
order by Activity.WhenDate desc
